event.title: Software Freedom Day
event.subtitle: Join the Movement
event.tagline: Join the Movement ‚Ä¢ Celebrate Freedom ‚Ä¢ Shape the Future
event.meta_description: Celebrate freedom and innovation at Software Freedom Day 2025. Join developers, advocates, and newcomers for talks, discussions, and community events online.

cards.title: Freedom & Independence
cards.description: Free Software and Open Source celebrate the freedom and independence of people who use software. These are ethical approaches that value your fundamental rights to use, study, share, and modify software.

cards.title: Global Community
cards.description: Join us for the 21st annual Software Freedom Day celebrations in Australia. Connect with leading contributors and organizers building businesses around Free and Open Source projects.

cards.title: Innovation & Ethics
cards.description: Learn about the ethics of software development, the advantages of open hardware, and how Free Software has grown from philosophy to powering the entire digital freedom ecosystem.

sponsors.name: Melbourne PC User / Mebourne Creators Collective

contact.title: Contact
contact.values: Be respectful ‚Ä¢ Be inclusive ‚Ä¢ Be aware
